1.title: When Filming Yourself Goes Wrong
1.plot: As the veil of secrecy they have enjoyed for 2,000 years is being ripped away by cell phone cams and social media, an ancient group of Superheroes choose a popular Alternative News channel to help tell their story to the world. But when a video of a poveracci being attacked by a monster on their property goes viral, they decide to film their side of the story as investigators begin to disappear.

2.title: Distractions Distractions
2.plot: With the constant distraction of Lugh and Kara fighting and the never ending distractions that plague Zeke's bar, no one realizes just how out of control everything is until Fischer starts going through film footage. As the twins close in on Theo, a deeper story begins to come to light, that wreaks of a set up. But who is the real enemy?

3.title: Pieces - a.k.a "WTF Happened Last Night?"
3.plot: Lugh goes after Kara, leaving Zeke to pick up the pieces and sort the collateral damage Paranormal News Online has wrought. Doc's search for Edward leads him to Elizabeth's house, where he finds more than he bargained for. When the Twins notice Theo puts off electrical charges, they call Frankie to get answers. Fischer leads Zeke to a strange find in the basement as Doc stumbles upon Theo's hideout.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

-1.title: Real Vampires Kill Man in Texas UPDATE
-1.plot: Hundreds of thousands witness this viral "Found Footage" update within hours of its release. As shock waves ripple across the globe, one question remains - "How did they get it?"

imdb.plot outline: "Monsters, Magic, Music, and Mayhem are the mainstay in this Superhero franchise, set in the Horror genre." At the base of the oldest existing pyramid on the planet, buried beneath the hills of central Texas by the blast that ended the dinosaurs, a small clan of cursed Messianic warriors, deities and mythological heroes, has secretly carried on its mission for thousands of years. Lead by the Celtic Demigod CuChulainn (played by Wrestling Mega-Star Andrew Galloway aka Drew McIntyre), this unlikely band of Dark Heroes has been charged with keeping the balance between good and evil upon the earth. Modern-day finds them all struggling with the karmic debris created by living through two millennia. Social media and technology are tearing away at the veil of secrecy that has kept their enigmas so well hidden from the world, and from each other, as the centuries have rolled by. While the drama of their personal lives erupts in an all too perfect distraction, the real enemy has begun a war, unlike anything humanity can remember. CuChulainn must now take matters into his own hands or watch helplessly as humanity is virtually made extinct by the warring gods.
imdb.title: The Cursed
plot: Led by the cursed Celtic God of War (CuChulainn), a small band of dark heroes strives to stave off the 13th Apocalypse. Fighting to protect humanity from itself, and the things it no longer believes in.::shea ronsonette
